title: Cathedral-top Sheraton armchair, one of a pair
description: armchair, one of a pair, Sheraton style; square open back, occupied by four slender fluted uprights terminating at top in fan-shaped carvings, making pointed arches; the so-called \'cathedral\' top; oblong crest at center of crest rail; arms flare outward slightly, and are set back from front of seat; tapering front legs are fluted and terminate in spade feet. Rear legs plain; seat slightly serpentine, covered with green satin
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in Memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
